author: COMSOL
description:
This example examines two consecutive reactions taking place within a nonisothermal tubular reactor. Optimization calculations are made to find the temperature conditions in the reactor that maximize the production of an intermediary reaction product.

This model requires the Optimization Module.
label: optimal_cooling.mph
